title: Graph embeddings in Hyperbolic Space
dc:creator: Benjamin
description:
I gave a talk last night at the Berlin machine learning meetup on learning graph embeddings in hyperbolic space, featuring the recent NIPS 2017 paper of Nickel & Kiela. Covered are: An illustration of why the Euclidean plane is not a good place to embed trees (since circle circumference grows only linearly in the radius); …
